app_name: Little Stories. Read bedtime story books for kids
app_detail:
ğŸ† 1st place in â€œEntertainmentâ€ in Runet Rating 2018!
ğŸ† 1st place in â€œApp For Kidsâ€ in Golden App 2016!
ğŸ† 3rd place in â€œEntertainmentâ€ in Golden App 2017!

ğŸ“– The â€œLittle Storiesâ€ series present bedtime fairy tales for children, in which your kid plays the main part. It's quite simple â€“ just enter your kid's name and gender in the settings window and enjoy reading books about your son or daughter.

ğŸµ To make it even cooler, we've added beautiful melodies and wonderful pictures to help you raise your child by giving him or her only positive examples.

ğŸŒ™ These stories have a positive impact on the development of your child. We recommend reading them aloud to your children before bed to help the lessons contained in them soak in better. Even though female and male versions of the fairy tales have the same plot, there are some differences between the texts. This has an educational goal in view making right accents in child-rearing depending on a childâ€™s gender.

â˜€ï¸ Our great illustrated story books give a child an opportunity to become a hero who can solve various problems and make right deeds. Children are excited with our fairy tales! Donâ€™t be surprised when your baby will ask you to read these story books for kids over and over again.

ğŸ‘ In our turn, we do our best to make the reading books for kids as great as possible. All illustrations are in the best possible quality; the melodies are calm and beautiful, the plots of the stories are kind and educative. The reading books for children are quite short to make it easy for a child to listen till the end of the story, which is rather important. Our bedtime story books for kids are very interesting as they narrate about animals, insects, princes and princesses, etc. They teach love, respect, kindness, self-confidence. After having the book downloaded, you will need no online connection.

ğŸ’¯ We spend hundreds of working hours on each story book, only because we love children. We dream of growing a healthy and genial generation of kids, therefore we do our best to make some of our bedtime reading books for kids available for free. However, a good deal of success depends on your support. We work for the youngest pioneers to help them change life on Earth for better in the future. We strongly believe that childhood memories of your children will be very vivid.

â¤ï¸ Let love and kindness fill your family leisure time to make your life and the world around happier!

ğŸ”¸ Why â€œLittle Storiesâ€? ğŸ”¸
â€¢ No analogs in the world!
â€¢ 14 exciting stories so far and more to come
â€¢ 500+ pictures
â€¢ Enchanting music accompanying each story
â€¢ Gender determines the choice of illustrations

ğŸ”¹ Fairy tales: ğŸ”¹
â€¢ The Brave Eaglet (FREE)
â€¢ The Magic Christmas Tree (FREE)
â€¢ A Secret in the Night
â€¢ The Sea Lily
â€¢ Brighter Than A Star
â€¢ Who Is the First?
â€¢ The Fruit Kingdom
â€¢ The Little Nailâ€™s Adventures
â€¢ How To Reach A Star
â€¢ A Curious Mouse
â€¢ The Union of Three Planets
â€¢ True Friendship
â€¢ A Stegosaur Story
â€¢ A Guest on the Farm

ğŸ“™ Our stock of fairy tales is continuously replenished.
ğŸ“— Fairy tales are designed for kids aged 3+.

Follow us on: facebook.com/diveomedia

If for some reason you cannot download our bedtime books or you have any other problems related to this product please donâ€™t hesitate to contact us at abc@diveomedia.com
